mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM , B.MT_FIND_NUM , B.MT_FIND_TITLE , B.MT_FIND_CONTENT , B.MT_FIND_DATE , B.MT_FIND_LOCATION , B.MT_FIND_IMG , B.MT_FIND_VIEW , B.MT_FIND_GENDER , B.MT_FIND_PEOPLE , B.MT_FIND_AGE , B.MT_FIND_DEADLINE , B.MT_FIND_STATE , B.USER_ID , B.MT_FIND_COUNT FROM (SELECT A.MT_FIND_NUM , A.MT_FIND_TITLE , A.MT_FIND_CONTENT , A.MT_FIND_DATE , A.MT_FIND_LOCATION , A.MT_FIND_IMG , A.MT_FIND_VIEW , A.MT_FIND_GENDER , A.MT_FIND_PEOPLE , A.MT_FIND_AGE , A.MT_FIND_DEADLINE , A.MT_FIND_STATE , A.USER_ID , A.MT_FIND_COUNT FROM MT_FIND A WHERE A.MT_FIND_REP_YN ='N' AND A.MT_FIND_STATE = '신청가능' ORDER BY A.MT_FIND_DEADLINE ASC)B WHERE ROWNUM < 4

SELECT A.MT_FIND_NUM , A.MT_FIND_TITLE , A.MT_FIND_CONTENT , A.MT_FIND_REP_YN , A.MT_FIND_DATE , A.MT_FIND_LOCATION , A.MT_FIND_IMG , A.MT_FIND_VIEW , A.MT_FIND_GENDER , A.MT_FIND_PEOPLE , A.MT_FIND_AGE , A.MT_FIND_DEADLINE , A.MT_FIND_STATE , A.USER_ID , A.MT_FIND_COUNT FROM MT_FIND A WHERE A.MT_FIND_NUM = #{ num }

SELECT A.RNUM , A.MT_FIND_NUM , A.MT_FIND_TITLE , A.MT_FIND_CONTENT , A.MT_FIND_REP_YN , A.MT_FIND_DATE , A.MT_FIND_LOCATION , A.MT_FIND_IMG , A.MT_FIND_VIEW , A.MT_FIND_GENDER , A.MT_FIND_PEOPLE , A.MT_FIND_AGE , A.MT_FIND_DEADLINE , A.MT_FIND_STATE , A.USER_ID , A.MT_FIND_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.MT_FIND_NUM , B.MT_FIND_TITLE , B.MT_FIND_CONTENT , B.MT_FIND_REP_YN , B.MT_FIND_DATE , B.MT_FIND_LOCATION , B.MT_FIND_IMG , B.MT_FIND_VIEW , B.MT_FIND_GENDER , B.MT_FIND_PEOPLE , B.MT_FIND_AGE , B.MT_FIND_DEADLINE , B.MT_FIND_STATE , B.USER_ID , B.MT_FIND_COUNT FROM (SELECT C.MT_FIND_NUM , C.MT_FIND_TITLE , C.MT_FIND_CONTENT , C.MT_FIND_REP_YN , C.MT_FIND_DATE , C.MT_FIND_LOCATION , C.MT_FIND_IMG , C.MT_FIND_VIEW , C.MT_FIND_GENDER , C.MT_FIND_PEOPLE , C.MT_FIND_AGE , C.MT_FIND_DEADLINE , C.MT_FIND_STATE , C.USER_ID , C.MT_FIND_COUNT FROM MT_FIND C ORDER BY MT_FIND_DATE DESC)B)A WHERE (A.RNUM BETWEEN #{ startRow } and #{ endRow })
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MT_FIND A ( A.MT_FIND_NUM , A.MT_FIND_TITLE , A.MT_FIND_CONTENT , A.MT_FIND_REP_YN , A.MT_FIND_DATE , A.MT_FIND_LOCATION , A.MT_FIND_IMG , A.MT_FIND_VIEW , A.MT_FIND_GENDER , A.MT_FIND_PEOPLE , A.MT_FIND_AGE , A.MT_FIND_DEADLINE , A.MT_FIND_STATE , A.USER_ID , A.MT_FIND_COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_MT_FIND_NUM.NEXTVAL , #{ title } , #{ content } , 'N' , default , #{ location } , #{ imgName } , 0 , #{ gender } , #{ people } , #{ age } , #{ date } , '신청가능' , #{ userId } , 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM , B.MT_REVIEW_NUM , B.MT_REVIEW_TITLE , B.MT_REVIEW_IMG1 , B.MT_REVIEW_CON , B.MT_REVIEW_DATE , B.MT_REVIEW_REP_YN , B.USER_ID , B.MT_REVIEW_IMG2 , B.MT_REVIEW_IMG3 , B.MT_REVIEW_REC FROM (SELECT A.MT_REVIEW_NUM , A.MT_REVIEW_TITLE , A.MT_REVIEW_IMG1 , A.MT_REVIEW_CON , A.MT_REVIEW_DATE , A.MT_REVIEW_REP_YN , A.USER_ID , A.MT_REVIEW_IMG2 , A.MT_REVIEW_IMG3 , A.MT_REVIEW_REC FROM MT_REVIEW A WHERE A.MT_REVIEW_REP_YN IN ('N','L') ORDER BY A.MT_REVIEW_DATE DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM < 6

SELECT ROWNUM , B.MT_REVIEW_NUM , B.MT_REVIEW_TITLE , B.MT_REVIEW_IMG1 , B.MT_REVIEW_CON , B.MT_REVIEW_DATE , B.MT_REVIEW_REP_YN , B.USER_ID , B.MT_REVIEW_IMG2 , B.MT_REVIEW_IMG3 , B.MT_REVIEW_REC FROM (SELECT A.MT_REVIEW_NUM , A.MT_REVIEW_TITLE , A.MT_REVIEW_IMG1 , A.MT_REVIEW_CON , A.MT_REVIEW_DATE , A.MT_REVIEW_REP_YN , A.USER_ID , A.MT_REVIEW_IMG2 , A.MT_REVIEW_IMG3 , A.MT_REVIEW_REC FROM MT_REVIEW A WHERE A.MT_REVIEW_REP_YN IN ('N','L') ORDER BY A.MT_REVIEW_REC DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM < 6

SELECT A.MT_REVIEW_NUM , A.MT_REVIEW_TITLE , A.MT_REVIEW_IMG1 , A.MT_REVIEW_CON , A.MT_REVIEW_DATE , A.MT_REVIEW_REP_YN , A.USER_ID , A.MT_REVIEW_IMG2 , A.MT_REVIEW_IMG3 , A.MT_REVIEW_REC FROM MT_REVIEW A WHERE A.MT_REVIEW_NUM = #{ num } AND A.MT_REVIEW_REP_YN IN ('N','L')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MT_REVIEW A WHERE A.MT_REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%' AND A.MT_REVIEW_REP_YN IN ('N','L')
